WHO insists it hid nothing, sounded virus alarm from start tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734859 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734859/who-insists-it-hid-nothing-sounded-virus-alarm-from-start/story/ The World Health Organization insisted Monday that it sounded the alarm on the novel coronavirus right from the very start and had hidden nothing from Washington about the deadly pandemic. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 04:01:09 +0800
Singapore confirms record jump of 1,426 COVID-19 cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734857 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734857/singapore-confirms-record-jump-of-1-426-covid-19-cases/story/ Singapore's health ministry confirmed on Monday an additional 1,426 cases of the COVID-19 infection, a record daily jump, mainly among foreign workers living in dormitories. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 02:03:56 +0800
Quezon City COVID-19 cases reaches 1,062 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734856 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/734856/quezon-city-covid-19-cases-reaches-1-062/story/ The number of persons who tested positive for the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Quezon City, based on information from the Department of Health, has reached 1,062 cases on Monday. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 01:18:03 +0800
Brgy. capt. sa Batangas, nilabag daw ang social distancing at nagpa-photo op sa pamimigay ng food packs tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734855 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/734855/brgy-capt-sa-batangas-nilabag-daw-ang-social-distancing-at-nagpa-photo-op-sa-pamimigay-ng-food-packs/story/ Isang barangay captain sa Tanauan, Batangas ang posibleng padalhan ng show-cause order ng Interior and Local Government dahil sa sumbong na nilabag niya ang social distancing policy at pagbabawal sa mass gatherings sa pamimigay ng relief goods. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 01:05:31 +0800
Analyst Heydarian weighs in on Philippines handling of COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734854 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734854/analyst-heydarian-weighs-in-on-philippines-handling-of-covid-19-pandemic/story/ GMA Network s resident political analyst Richard Heydarian weighed opposing perspectives on the Philippines handling of the coronavirus pandemic in a Stand for Truth episode on Monday. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 00:49:03 +0800
In shadow of the COVID-19 pandemic, Muslims face a Ramadan like never before tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734851 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734851/in-shadow-of-the-covid-19-pandemic-muslims-face-a-ramadan-like-never-before/story/ Days before the holy fasting month of Ramadan begins, the Islamic world is grappling with an untimely paradox of the new coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic: enforced separation at a time when socialising is almost sacred. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 00:40:43 +0800
Sekyu sa Cebu na nagtapos na cum laude, kumusta na ngayon bilang guro? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734850 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/734850/sekyu-sa-cebu-na-nagtapos-na-cum-laude-kumusta-na-ngayon-bilang-guro/story/ Marami ang humanga at malamang ginawang inspirasyon ang security guard ng Cebu na si Erwin Macua, na pinagsabay ang pagbabantay at pag-aaral para maabot ang kaniyang pangarap na makatapos ng kolehiyo. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:55:25 +0800
Office of Civil Defense: All donations received by intended beneficiaries tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734849 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734849/office-of-civil-defense-all-donations-received-by-intended-beneficiaries/story/ The Office of Civil Defense (OCD), the government agency that manages donations for healthcare facilities and workers amid the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic, assured the public on Monday that all donations “are being received by intended beneficiaries.” Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:45:17 +0800
Pekeng ID na may pirma ni Duterte, ibinebenta ng P1k-P3k para makalusot sa mga checkpoint tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734848 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/734848/pekeng-id-na-may-pirma-ni-duterte-ibinebenta-ng-p1k-p3k-para-makalusot-sa-mga-checkpoint/story/ Inaresto ng National Bureau of Investigation (NBI)-Laguna ang isang lalaking nagbebenta umano ng mga pekeng ID na may logo ng Malacañang at pirma pa ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte upang makalusot daw sa mga quarantine checkpoint. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:39:05 +0800
Carmona, Cavite rolls out circumcision on wheels amid ECQ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734846 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/734846/carmona-cavite-rolls-out-circumcision-on-wheels-amid-ecq/story/ The municipal government of Carmona, Cavite has rolled out a vehicle that conducts free door-to-door circumcisions amid the enhanced community quarantine. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:38:00 +0800
COVID-19 survivor claims she was forced out of Tagaytay tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734847 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/734847/covid-19-survivor-claims-she-was-forced-out-of-tagaytay/story/ “I went to our house in Tagaytay because I can do self quarantine in my sister s house because it s a big house and I can rest and recuperate well. But unfortunately after three days I was forced by Tagaytay LGU to leave,” Reyes said.“Little did I know that the people in our barangay posted on Facebook that I am COVID-positive, made takas and went into hiding, with matching picture,” she added. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:26:58 +0800
Duterte: Water allocation hiked in NCR to ensure hand-washing amid COVID-19 threat tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734845 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/734845/duterte-water-allocation-hiked-in-ncr-to-ensure-hand-washing-amid-covid-19-threat/story/ Duterte said the NWRB hiked the Metropolitan Waterworks and Sewerage System s allocation from Angat Dam to 46 cubic meters per second from 42 cms in response to the call “to observe frequent hand-washing and bath-taking” as part of personal hygiene amid the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:11:32 +0800
Bacoor residents moving in circles to ensure social distancing amid COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734844 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/734844/bacoor-residents-moving-in-circles-to-ensure-social-distancing-amid-covid-19/story/ The local government of Bacoor in Cavite is requiring people to move in circles outside their homes to stop the spread of COVID-19 through social distancing. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:09:36 +0800
North America extends COVID-19 travel restrictions - US official tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734843 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734843/north-america-extends-covid-19-travel-restrictions-us-official/story/ The United States, Mexico and Canada are extending restrictions on non-essential travel across their shared borders for an additional 30 days, US Acting Department of Homeland Security Secretary Chad Wolf said in a tweet. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 23:01:03 +0800
'Tuli on Wheels,' umarangkada sa panahon ng COVID-19 crisis sa Cavite tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734842 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/734842/tuli-on-wheels-umarangkada-sa-panahon-ng-covid-19-crisis-sa-cavite/story/ Hindi problema sa mga batang nais magpatuli sa Carmona, Cavite kung hindi man sila makapunta sa mga ospital dahil sa enhanced community quarantine at takot na mahawahan ng COVID-19 dahil ang mga magtutuli ang pupunta sa kanila gamit ang "tuli on wheels" Mon, 20 Apr 2020 22:48:55 +0800
